title: Horror at the supermarket: Episode 205
description:
It was our days before Christmas at the supermarket and spirits were high and people cheerful as they completed their Christmas shopping.

Nobody would have taken much notice as the ordinary middle-aged man entered the store. And nobody would have guessed he had in his possession a knife and an axe.

But what happened next nobody present would ever forget....
